Name: Brain Storm : Tower Bombarde
About the game: 'The best defense is offense' is the wrong slogan for this game. 'The best offense is defense' - there is the tactic that can help you survive in virtual world and find your best human qualities that help to solve the puzzles. Big game world of more than three hundred rooms is ready for you to research it! Features Minimalistic design Researching big open world of three hundred maze-rooms The world is divided in 8 various locations with many puzzles Many improvements that you can get fighting bosses and visiting secret places More than four hours of gameplay in speedrun The game takes only 8 megs – you don’t have to delete other games! Controls WASD - movement Space - shield Z,X – switch skills C – game map
